entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 10:44 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain at times mixed with wet snow near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
